title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI agents at the edge: Build for offline, scale in cloud (DEV301)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 边缘AI代理：离线构建，云端扩展 (DEV301)
abstract: This session demonstrates building Generative AI agents that operate fully offline using the AWS Strands Agents SDK. The presentation covers deploying lightweight local models with Ollama and integrating custom tools for remote manufacturing, field operations, and data sovereignty scenarios. Explore how these edge-deployed agents seamlessly scale to leverage cloud capabilities, transitioning to powerful models like Claude on Amazon Bedrock when connectivity is available. The session provides practical patterns for combining local processing with cloud AI to create resilient, location-independent solutions.
abstract_cn: 本次会议演示了如何使用AWS Strands Agents SDK构建完全离线运行的生成式AI代理。演示内容涵盖通过Ollama部署轻量级本地模型，并集成用于远程制造、现场操作和数据主权场景的自定义工具。探索这些边缘部署的代理如何无缝扩展以利用云功能，在连接可用时过渡到Amazon Bedrock上的Claude等强大模型。本次会议提供了将本地处理与云AI相结合的实用模式，以创建具有弹性的、位置无关的解决方案。
